title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 318.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 318.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The regulations contained herein are intended to support
the Board in fulfilling its legislative mandate to fund administrative costs
and special fund payments that are imposed upon and collected from all affected
employers provided for in the Workers' Compensation Law (WCL). In addition, Chapter 57 of the Laws of 2013 authorized the Board to streamline the manner in
which it collects its administrative and special fund assessments to one that
is consistent among the various categories of remitters and is based upon
active coverage. The regulations contained herein support that
streamlining. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
318.1

Adopted, New

York State Register January 7, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 01, eff. 1/7/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
